dqm.jku.trustkg.util

Class DataTypeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dqm.jku.trustkg.util.DataTypeConverter

  • public class DataTypeConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    lisa Conversion methods in this class have to convert to one of the following data types: - Object - String - Double - Float - Integer - Date - Boolean Please do not use any other data types.

      • getDataTypeFromCSVRecord

        public static void getDataTypeFromCSVRecord(Attribute a,
                                            java.lang.String val)
        Get a data type from a csv record. It uses TryParsers for recognizing the data type. Integer was scrapped because in big numbers (e.g. order ids) an overflow can happen Opportunity for future research on creating CSV data type parsers!
        Parameters:
        a - the corresponding attribute
        val - the String, from which the data type should be recognized

      • getDataValueFromCSV

        public static java.lang.Object getDataValueFromCSV(Attribute a,
                                                   java.lang.String val)
        Get a value from the string read in a csv record. If a new Value is assignable to the saved class, but the parser creates an error, e.g. if a double value is found, when parsing an long, the data type is refined to its next hierarchical class.
        Parameters:
        a - the corresponding attribute to the value
        val - the value in String-form
        Returns:
        the Object parsed from the String
